answers.answer: Anybody can get diabetes I was on the border withy last pregnancy and u only weighed 130 when I got pregnant worked out the while time and only gained 20lbs. This time I weighed 145 on getting pregnant and have gained 27lbs at 37 weeks and my sugars have been great

I don't think it matters. This is something I would look up or ask a doc about, but there are healthy ppl at healthy weights everywhere who end up diabetic or were born at a greater risk. Every pregnant woman I've known has had to drink the icky concoction. Also, I eat very healthy, especially since finding out about LO, and at a healthy weight, but my mother had gestational diabetes with me, so I'm at a greater risk anyway. So definitely talk to your doc, or at least Google it for now. I've heard the drink is terrible, but there's nothing we wouldn't do to ensure the health of our babies, right?

No everyone is at risk for gestational diabetes, that's why it is important everyone get tested. A healthy life style and eating well is a way to reduce the risk of gestational diabetes, however very thin, fit, women get gestational diabetes.

You can be at a higher risk, even healthy of you have a family history. My last pregnancy my numbers were high after my test, I'm 5'7 and weighed 136lbs when I took the test last pregnancy. But my father is type 2 and it runs in both his and my mother's side of the family. Luckily I was ok, and they did a pre test this pregnancy but I still need to take the test just in case

Sometimes they will let you eat jellybeans instead of drinking the liquid. I eat the appropriate number of Surf Sweets jellybeans. They taste better than most jellybeans and are organic, use natural dyes and real fruit as flavorings. I use them because the drink contains something I am allergic to but I've had friends who were told they could do the jellybean because they didn't want to drink the  liquid. You have to eat a certain number of jellybeans in a certain amount of time. Ask your doctor.
I agree everyone is at risk. It depends on how well the person's pancreas is secreting insulin to battle the amounts of sugars we put in our body.

My first go round I got to eat a certain number of gummy bears instead of the drink. Honestly its only an hiur of or time and a nasy drink. what that compared to the health of your baby . There will be much more unpleasant things in motherhood

question: common for over weight woman?If your healthy and not over weight Do you have to worry about the test?As i would much rather not. I know my sugar levels are fine as im very healthy.
